description: This file defines a Java interface named TemperatureMeasurable that declares methods for getting and setting the measured temperature on a device.

classes.name: TemperatureMeasurable
classes.description: An interface for devices capable of measuring temperature, declaring methods to retrieve and assign the temperature value.

methods.name: getMeasuredTemperature
methods.description: Retrieves the current measured temperature from the device.

methods.name: setMeasuredTemperature
methods.description: Sets the measured temperature on the device.
